comments.body: I'll update rules_haskell in a separate PR, at which point this patch will be unnecessary..

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@     # Separate package and target (if present).
-    package_target = pattern_str[2:].split(":", maxsplit = 2)
+    package_target = pattern_str[2:].split(":", 2)
     package_str = package_target[0]
     target_str = None
